card.description: A random selection of popular songs with and Billboard Top 100 chart information as well as other characteristics.

context.potentialUses: Predict how big of a hit a song was based on its genre and other factors.

Loudness score.description: A scoring of the song's loudness, where low negative numbers like -13 mean relatively quiet, and high negative numbers like -5 mean relatively loud.

Tempo in beats per minute.description: Tempo of the song in beats per minute (BPM). Higher numbers mean faster, more energetic songs.

Duration in seconds.description: Length of the song in seconds.

Year.description: The year the song was released.

Weeks on the Billboard Top 100.description: The total number of weeks the songs was listed on the Billboard Top 100.

Billboard rank peak.description: The highest position the song reached on the Billboard Top 100.
